WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 26 SEP THRU 04 OCT
   BY M/V AMAZON WARRIOR TOWING 12 10000 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-39.00S 039-30.00W, 23-06.00S 038-49.00W,
   24-21.00S 039-52.00W, 23-59.00S 040-28.00W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2868/19.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 OCT 19.
